title: Debug: Calendar events not displaying from Nostr
description: Even after adding relay pool subscription, no calendar events show up. Need to debug: 1) Are relays receiving the subscription? 2) Are any NIP-52 events on the connected relays? 3) Is the filter correct?
close_reason: Fixed by: 1) Adding try_process_events_core to process relay events, 2) Tracking subscribed relays and sending to newly connected ones, 3) Fixed UTF-8 truncation panic. Now parsing 40+ calendar events from relays.

title: No calendar events fetched from Nostr relays
close_reason: Added relay pool subscription - was only subscribing locally to nostrdb, now also calls pool.subscribe() to fetch from relays

title: Day cell click area too small - only day number navigates
close_reason: Made entire day cell clickable with hover highlight, not just the day number

title: Analyze calendar app against Apple HIG for desktop and mobile
description: Conduct a comprehensive review of the notedeck calendar app UI/UX against Apple Human Interface Guidelines. Review both desktop and mobile layouts/views for: spacing, touch targets, typography, navigation patterns, visual hierarchy, and accessibility. Document findings and create actionable improvement items.
close_reason: Fixed key Apple HIG issues: 1) Touch targets increased to 44x44pt, 2) Removed .weak() from time/date text for better contrast, 3) Section headers made prominent (14pt strong), 4) Added shape indicators for colorblind accessibility (square=all-day, circle=timed), 5) Close button hit area expanded to 44x44pt, 6) Detail panel width now has 320pt minimum.

title: Implement week view
close_reason: Implemented week view with 7-column layout showing events for each day

title: Add kind-1111 NIP-22 comments for calendar events
description: Implement comments capability for calendar events using NIP-22 (kind 1111). Features: 1) View comments on calendar events, 2) Post new comments on events, 3) Reply to existing comments. Comments use uppercase tags (K, E, A) for root scope and lowercase (k, e, a) for parent. Reference: NIP-22 spec and https://github.com/damus-io/nostrdb/pull/93 for nostrdb support.
close_reason: Implemented NIP-22 kind 1111 comments for calendar events. Added comment.rs module with Comment/CachedComment structs, subscription filters, collapsible comments section in event detail view with author names and timestamps.

title: Upgrade to interactive walkers map when notedeck updates to egui 0.33
description: Currently using static map images due to egui version mismatch between walkers (egui 0.33) and notedeck (custom fork). When notedeck upgrades to egui 0.33+, replace static map with interactive walkers widget for pan/zoom capability. Dependency: walkers crate. Blocked until egui version alignment.

title: Show country flag for event locations in all calendar views
description: Display country flags based on event location. BLOCKED: egui does not support flag emoji rendering - regional indicator symbols render as separate letters. See notedeck_calendar-emj.

title: Filter events by country and web-of-trust
description: As a notedeck calendar app user, I want to be able to filter for events in: 1) my country, and/or 2) in my web-of-trust (my follows, and my follows' follows). This enables discovering relevant local and community events.
close_reason: Implemented country filter and web-of-trust filter. Added filter UI with search box, WoT toggle, and country dropdown. Filters apply to all views (month, week, day, agenda). WoT filter uses UserAccount.is_following() from notedeck accounts system.

title: Render event location address on map in event detail view
description: When an event has an address/location, display it on an interactive map in the event detail view. Research map implementation from https://gitlab.com/soapbox-pub/pathos for reference. Consider using OpenStreetMap tiles or similar for the map display.

title: Search for keywords in calendar events and calendars
description: As a notedeck calendar user, I want to be able to search for a keyword in calendar events and/or calendars. Implementation should follow the patterns used in the rest of notedeck app for keyword search. Research notedeck_columns search implementation for consistency.
close_reason: Implemented keyword search in filter bar. Search matches against event title, content, and location. Applied to all calendar views.
